assertions.description: Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: When the receiverfsp information already exists in the request in to section, Then party lookup should be skipped and PUT /bulkTxn response should be received

assertions.description: Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid is receiverfspid
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: When the request has a receiver-id that does not exist in receiver fsp, Then the client should receive an ID not found as error message.

assertions.description: Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: When the receiver fsp responds after the timeout elapses, Then the client should receive an timed-out as error message.

assertions.description: Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found

test_cases.name: Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When one transfer has a succesful party lookup and the other has a failure, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers, And the response to PUT should only have one acceptParty.

assertions.description: Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found
Check response has only one transfer result
Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When one transfer has a succesful party lookup and the other has a timeout, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers, And the response to PUT should only have one acceptParty.

assertions.description: Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found

test_cases.name: Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request that has the same receiver id, When acceptParty is set to true for both the transfers in PUT request, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers for acceptQuote.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: When there are 3 transfers in the bulk request 2 of which that have the same receiver fsp id and the 3rd one has a different receiver fsp id and acceptParty is true for all the transfers, Then the PUT response should have details of all the 3 transfers for acceptQuote.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: Given there are 3 transfers in the bulk request 2 of which that have the same receiver fsp id and the 3rd one has a different receiver fsp id, When the receiver with receiverhas1id times out sending the response, Then the PUT response should have details of all the 2 transfers from receiverfsphas2ids.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: Given there are 3 transfers in the bulk request all of which that have the same receiver fsp id, When the receiver fsp sends the response for only 2 transfers in the batch and not the third one, Then the PUT response should have details of all the 3 transfers with an error for the 3rd transfer that did not have any response.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer
